name: Music_2499.wav
keywords: ['house music', 'party music', 'female voice', 'hand claps', 'programmed percussion', 'synth sounds', 'bass', 'moderate tempo', 'dance music']
caption: This house music features a female voice singing the main melody. This is accompanied by programmed percussion playing a simple beat. The kick is played on every count. Hand claps are played at every alternate count. The bass plays the root notes of the chords. Synth chords are played in the background. This song can be played at a club.
